abstract: Lime Rock , a private equity firm that focuses on the global energy sector announced Thursday that it had closed its fifth Lime Rock Partners fund, Lime Rock Partners V, L.P., with a total $1.4 billion in investor capital commitments.
lead_paragraph: Lime Rock , a private equity firm that focuses on the global energy sector announced Thursday that it had closed its fifth Lime Rock Partners fund, Lime Rock Partners V, L.P., with a total $1.4 billion in investor capital commitments.

headline.main: Lime Rock Raises $1.4 Billion for New Energy Fund
